div.p: Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}

ul.li: multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

description.value: Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}
